page.title: 08Vale of Evesham School
page.content: This 'special' school opened in 1969 and provides day and weekly boarding education for about 145 children with learning difficulties. The age range is 7-16 years, with some pre-school children. The school is situated on a 4 acre site, together with the High and Middle schools. A first School is due to be added shortly. The boarding accommodation includes 4 dormitories, day rooms, T.V. room, laundry room, Matron's office and medical room. The Headmaster and Matron live on the site, together with 3 teachers and 4 child care assistants Meals are provided throughout the day. The curriculum covers a wide range of subjects but tends to be individual. Courses include a careers programme and training in the skills necessary for a independant life.
